endpoint.name: Default Endpoint
endpoint.desc: Default Endpoint to use on "Connect" action.

on-join-room.description: Triggered when joined successfully into a room.

on-leave-room.description: Triggered when left from a room.

on-join-error.description: Triggered when failing to join a room.

on-error.description: Triggered when any error come from the Colyseus SDK. (Prefer using specific error handlers such as "On Join Error" rather than this one.)

on-room-error.description: Triggered when an error happened on the server.

on-room-message.description: Triggered when the room broadcasts a message, or sends a message directly to this client.

type.name: Type
type.desc: Message type. Wildcard is supported via "*".

on-room-statechange.description: Triggered after full state updates have been applied. To detect specific changes use conditions under "room state" section.

on-get-available-rooms.description: Triggers when available rooms response is ready in the "Value" expresssion.

foreach-room-available.description: Iterates over rooms available (Available during "On Get Available Rooms" condition).

is-message-type.description: Returns true if current message type matches the provided value.

type.name: Message type
type.desc: The message type sent by the server.

is-message-value.description: Returns true if current message value matches the provided criteria.

is-message-value-at.description: Returns true if current message value at matches the provided criteria.

path.name: Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "messages.0"

is-message-value-of-type.description: Returns true if current message value type matches the provided criteria.

type.name: Type
type.desc: The type expected for the message value.

is-message-value-of-type-at.description: Returns true if current message value type at matches the provided criteria.

path.name: Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "messages.0"

type.name: Type
type.desc: The type expected for the message value.

schema-path-change.description: Triggers when a variable changes at a specific path in the state. (e.g. "player.x")

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "item.property"

state-items-foreach.description: Iterates over the items of an ArraySchema or MapSchema.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable holding the items

state-collection-item-add.description: Triggers when an item is added to ArraySchema or MapSchema.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "entities"

state-collection-item-change.description: Triggers when an item is changed inside ArraySchema or MapSchema.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "entities"

state-collection-item-remove.description: Triggers when an item is removed from ArraySchema or MapSchema.

path.name: Path
path.desc: Path of the variable you'd like to listen for. e.g. "entities"

is-state-value-at.description: Returns true if current state value at {0} matches the provided criteria.

path.name: Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "entities.item_0.is_alive"

schema-compare-current-value.description: Returns true if current value matches the provided criteria.

schema-compare-current-value-at.description: Returns true if current value matches the provided criteria.

path.name: Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "messages.0"

schema-compare-current-key.description: Only available during add/remove of collection items (MapSchema, ArraySchema)

schema-compare-items-at-count.description: Compare the number of items at a specific path in the state.

path.name: Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "players.one.inventory"

schema-compare-current-items-count.description: Only available during add/remove of collection items (MapSchema, ArraySchema)

schema-array-has-value.description: Returns true if Array at path in the state has the provided value.

path.name: Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "players.one.inventory"

schema-map-has-key.description: Returns true if Array at path in the state has the provided value.

path.name: Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "players.one.inventory"

has-error-code.description: Compares the error code of the last error received.

code.name: Error Code
code.desc: The error code to compare against.

has-error-message.description: Compares the error message of the last error received.

message.name: Error Message
message.desc: The error message to compare against.

endpoint.name: Endpoint
endpoint.desc: Set endpoint to {0}. If empty, uses the Default Endpoint property from the global Colyseus object type.

name.name: Room name
name.desc: The room name is defined via `gameServer.define("my_room", ...)` in your server.

options.name: Options
options.desc: The provided options will be available in the server-side at both `onJoin()` and `onAuth()` methods.

name.name: Room name
name.desc: The room name is defined via `gameServer.define("my_room", ...)` in your server.

options.name: Options
options.desc: The provided options will be available in the server-side at both `onJoin()` and `onAuth()` methods.

name.name: Room name
name.desc: The room name is defined via `gameServer.define("my_room", ...)` in your server.

options.name: Options
options.desc: The provided options will be available in the server-side at both `onJoin()` and `onAuth()` methods.

join-room-by-id.description: Join an existing room by its ID

options.name: Options
options.desc: The provided options will be available in the server-side at both `onJoin()` and `onAuth()` methods.

consume-seat-reservation.description: Consume a seat reservation made from the server-side

reservation.name: Seat reservation data
reservation.desc: JSON containing the reservation made from the server-side

reconnect-room.display-text: Reconnect into a room using its cached ReconnectionToken ({0}).
reconnect-room.description: Reconnect into a previously connected room.

message.name: Message
message.desc: Data of your message. Messages arrive on server-side at "onMessage(type, ...)".

room-send-json.description: Send JSON message to a room

message.name: JSON Message
message.desc: JSON representation of the message. Messages arrive on server-side at "onMessage(type, ...)".

get-available-rooms.description: Get available rooms by name, "On Get Available Rooms" is triggered when data is available.

name.name: Room name
name.desc: The room name is defined via `gameServer.define("my_room", ...)` in your server.

json.description: Evaluates provided string and return stringified JSON object

data.name: Data
data.desc: Plain JavaScript Object inside a string

current-value-at.description: Get nested value from current item

path.name: Variable Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "messages.0"

previous-value.description: Get previous value from current field. Only available during "On change" on an instance variable. Not avaialble for arrays and maps.

state-value.description: Get a value from room's state

path.name: Variable Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "messages.0"

current-state-path.description: Get current path being evaluated from state

room-id.description: Get roomId of the room connected.

room-name.description: Get the name of the room connected.

session-id.description: Get unique sessionId for the client. (This property matches the client.sessionId from the server-side)

reconnection-token.description: Get reconnection token to be used in the Reconnect action. (Available during "On Join")

message-type.description: Get current message type. (Available during "On Message")

message-value.description: Get current message value. (Available during "On Message")

message-value-at.description: Get a nested value on current message. (Available during "On Message")

path.name: Variable Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "skills.length", "skills.0.name"

message-value-type.description: Get the data type of MessageValue. Possible return values: "undefined", "number", "string", "boolean", "object".

message-value-at-type.description: Get the data type of MessageValueAt. Possible return values: "undefined", "number", "string", "boolean", "object".

path.name: Variable Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "skills.length", "skills.0.name"

current-items-count.description: Get total number of items on current collection. (Available during add/remove item events)

count-items-at.description: Get total number of items at a path. (Path must be a MapSchema or ArraySchema)

path.name: Variable Path
path.desc: A dot separated path to the variable. e.g. "skills.length", "skills.0.name"

close-code.description: Get close code from the last disconnection. (Available during "On Leave Room")

error-code-no-handler.description: 4210 → No room handler for provided room name type

error-code-invalid-room-id.description: 4212 → Room not found for provided room id

error-code-auth-failed.description: 4215 → Authentication failed (`onAuth` failed on the server)
